title.rendered: iPhone Charger Cable, Anker PowerLine+ III Lightning to USB A Cable, (3ft MFi Certified), USB Charging/Sync Lightning…

content.rendered:
Safe and Compatible

Officially MFi licensed for secure and dependable efficiency with any Lightning connecter machine.

Engineered to Endure

Featuring a strengthened construction for an unparalleled 35,000-bend lifespan.

Premium Design

Curved edges and polished stainless-steel seamlessly complement your telephone’s exterior.

Read more

(*11*)

Scratch-Resistant

The stainless-steel floor protects in opposition to scratches and scrapes, preserving the cable’s premium look over time.

High-Speed Data

Transfer motion pictures, music, or a complete picture library in seconds with 480Mbps knowledge speeds.

The Anker Advantage

High-speed charging. Leading expertise. Join our household of over 50 million completely satisfied customers, and change the best way you cost.

Read more

Model Number: A8822

PowerLine+ III USB-A to Lightning Cable

The Ultra-Durable Lightning Cable for Life

Strong and Durable

Our cables are more durable than ever, with tensile power able to supporting 175 lbs with out breaking. Combined with the 35,000-bend lifespan, PowerLine+ III is designed to face up to each twist, tug, and tangle.

Slimmer Yet Stronger

An optimized inside construction means the newest era of PowerLine has grow to be even slimmer than ever earlier than — with out sacrificing power.

Universal Compatibility

MFi licensed to work flawlessly with any machine that makes use of a Lightning connector.

A Cable for Life

We’re so assured in PowerLine+ III, we’re providing a hassle-free alternative for all high quality points. Not for half a 12 months, not for 18 months, however for a complete lifetime. It’s the one cable you’ll ever want to purchase.

Compatibility

iPhone 11 / 11 Pro / 11 Pro Max / XS / XS Max / XR / X / 8 / 8 Plus / 7 / 7 Plus / 6 / 6 Plus / 5s, iPad Air / Air 2, iPad mini / mini 2 / mini 3 / mini 4, iPad (4th era), iPod nano (seventh era), iPod contact (fifth era), AirPods, and AirPods with Wireless Charging Case.

Note

Does not help Power Delivery

No pouch included

Make positive this suits by getting into your mannequin quantity.
Completely sturdy: with its first-class endurance of over 35,000 bends and strains, your charging cable will live longer than your smartphone.
Premium design: your PowerLine+ III is an actual feast for the eyes with its rounded edges and trendy floor and suits completely with your smartphones and laptops.
MFI: The dependable certification ensures that every one your gadgets are charged in absolute security and at high velocity.
Need for velocity: switch music, motion pictures and extra in seconds thanks to the 480 Mbps knowledge switch.
What you get: a PowerLine+ III Lightning charging cable, an instruction handbook (English language not assured).
